title.value: Feasibility of cognitive neuroscience data collection during a speleological expedition
title.justification: This is the exact title of the paper as provided in the text.
title.quote: Feasibility of cognitive neuroscience data collection during a speleological expedition

extractions.description: This paper investigates the feasibility of conducting cognitive neuroscience and neuropsychology research in the extreme environment of a speleological (caving) expedition. It evaluates various measurement tools used to assess physiological, cognitive, and emotional states in such challenging conditions and provides recommendations for future research.

type.justification: The paper involves testing various data collection methods in a real-world setting of a speleological expedition and provides empirical results.
type.quote: The main goal of this project was to test the feasibility of conducting cognitive neuroscience and neuropsychology research in extreme environments, in this case during a speleological expedition.

name.justification: The primary focus of the research is on cognitive neuroscience, investigating brain function and behavior in naturalistic and extreme environments.
name.quote: The results of this first cognitive science and neuropsychology study in real expedition conditions supports feasibility of future work, and takes several practical steps towards more robust data collection in the field.

name.justification: The study also emphasizes neuropsychology as it investigates cognitive performance, emotional regulation, and subjective experiences.
name.quote: The main goal of this project was to test the feasibility of conducting cognitive neuroscience and neuropsychology research in extreme environments, in this case during a speleological expedition.

name.justification: The paper investigates human performance and safety in operational environments, which is a key aspect of the human factors research field.
name.quote: Understanding human behaviour and brain function under challenging conditions is broadly relevant to a range of safety-critical operations and professions.
